column4: Hello, I have a Gutsy install that is not pulling down an IP address from DHCP, but has all the drivers installed and I am posting this from a Gutsy laptop at the same time the desktop is running. So it's not a Linux issue. Please help!
if you type an ip address into firefox do you get google or whatever..
Right now I'm trying to do static IP if that helps at all
others are better at that..  I hinda have my hands full atm
